attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TO SAVE BRITAIN YOU MUST IMMEDIATELY BORROW 7 TRILLION POUNDS  MONEY IS STILL CHEAP ,OUR CREDITORS WILL NOT WANT TO MOVE AGAINST US . MOVE IN SMALL UNITS ALL OVER THE WORLD MARKETS .this is just a thought i have my reputation to consider too though much less than you.

rejection.details: The main thrust of your petition is unclear.  Also, Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
